trigger_prototype.name: {#HOST}:{#DIR} backup check failed
trigger_prototype.description: Backup could be inconsistent or could contain damaged chunks. Please try a repair of the borg repository

trigger_prototype.name: {#HOST}:{#DIR} backup monitoring failed, {#DIR}/status.txt is missing or unreadable
trigger_prototype.description: Check your backup script that it writes to status.txt inside the borg repository itself and that the zabbix user on the backup machine has read permissions

trigger_prototype.name: {#HOST}:{#DIR} backup check failed - remote
trigger_prototype.description: Backup could be inconsistent or could contain damaged chunks. Please try a repair of the borg repository

trigger_prototype.name: {#HOST}:{#DIR} backup monitoring failed, {#DIR}/status.txt is missing or unreadable - remote
trigger_prototype.description: Check your backup script that it writes to status.txt inside the borg repository itself and that the zabbix user on the backup machine has read permissions
